name: tailwindcss
description: Tailwindcss module for Proxmox Auto Installer

scripts.dev: concurrently -n TAILWIND,PYTHON,RELOAD -c yellow,blue,green "npx tailwindcss -i ./styles/app.css -o ../static/css/tailwind.css --watch" "bash -c 'source ../../../../dev-env.sh && nodemon --watch ../../back_end --ext py --exec \"python3 ../../back_end/server.py dev\"'" "nodemon --config ./nodemon.json"

author: Anthony Tropeano
